title: Max Payne 3
summary: Max Payne 3 is a third-person shooter video game developed by Rockstar Studios and published by Rockstar Games. It was released on May 15, 2012 for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360; a Microsoft Windows port was released on May 29, 2012, followed by an OS X port on June 20, 2013.[2] The game is the third entry in the Max Payne series and the sequel to Max Payne 2: The Fall of Max Payne.
